name: Azadarmedia
0:
”Alexa, open azadar media”
”Ask azadar media to play dua kumyal”
”Alexa, Ask azadar media for help”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: azadar media
des: Elevate your spiritual journey with "Azadar media," the app dedicated to audio prayers. Immerse yourself in the serenity of authentic Arabic prayers, accompanied by translations in Gujarati, Hindi/Urdu, and English. With a wide collection of powerful duas, this skill helps you connect with your spirituality, anytime and anywhere. Whether you're seeking solace or enhancing your spiritual practice, "blissful player" offers a peaceful and enriching experience for your soul.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
